mapper.select: select m_id, m_img, m_intro, count(a.m_id1) follower from member left outer join follow a on m_id = a.m_id2 where m_id = #{m_id} group by m_id, m_img, m_intro
select count(m_id1) follow from follow where m_id1=#{m_id}
select count(board.b_id) post from board where m_id = #{m_id} and b_type='G'
select count(businessboard.bb_id) post from businessboard where m_id = #{m_id} and bb_type='B'
select count(*) story from story where s_date > SYSDATE - 1 and m_id=#{m_id}

select * from (select m_id, board.b_id b_id, b_img1 b_img, b_date b_date, b_type from board join boardadd on board.b_id = boardadd.b_id union select m_id, businessboard.bb_id b_id, bb_img1 b_img, bb_date b_date, bb_type b_type from businessboard join businessboardadd on businessboard.bb_id = businessboardadd.bb_id) where m_id=#{m_id} order by b_date desc
select h_name, h_img from highlight where m_id=#{m_id} group by h_name, h_img
select count(*) follow from follow where m_id1=#{my_name} and m_id2=#{m_id}

select board.b_id b_id, board.m_id m_id, b_img1||','||b_img2||','||b_img3||','||b_img4||','||b_img5||','||b_img6||','||b_img7||','||b_img8||','||b_img9||','||b_img10 b_img,board.b_content b_content, to_char(board.b_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:Mi:SS') b_date, count(blike.b_id) likecount from board left outer join blike on board.b_id = blike.b_id left outer join boardadd on board.b_id = boardadd.b_id where board.b_id=#{b_id} group by board.b_id, board.b_content, board.m_id, to_char(board.b_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:Mi:SS'), b_img1||','||b_img2||','||b_img3||','||b_img4||','||b_img5||','||b_img6||','||b_img7||','||b_img8||','||b_img9||','||b_img10
select h_tag from hashtag where b_id=#{b_id}

select a.m_id2 r_mid, m_img, m_name from follow a join member on a.m_id2 = m_id where a.m_id1 = #{m_id} and a.m_id2 not in (select m_id2 from follow where m_id1=#{my_name}) and a.m_id2!=#{my_name} order by dbms_random.value
